articles.description: With Nepal's game against the UAE being a washout, Nepal have finished second in their group in the ICC Women’s T20 World Cup Asia Qualifier 2023.
articles.content:
Photo: CAN
Kathmandu, September 3
With Nepal’s game against the UAE being a washout, Nepal have finished second in their group in the ICC Womens T20 World Cup Asia Qualifier 2023.
